title: MIP 2 - Get Pay-check in Crypto
body:
MIP: 2
Title: Get Pay-check in Crypto
Status: Proposed
Author: @Siddharth | TheRoadRunnr 
Created: 28 Sep 2021

Simple Summary

The ability for users to take a part of their paycheck in crypto.

Motivation/Purpose

Currently, there are multiple points of friction:

(a) Illegal to directly take paycheck in cryptocurrency - If an employer pays an employee directly in cryptocurrencies, the employer breaks multiple laws including labor laws as cryptocurrency is not a negotiable instrument.

(b) No Provider that provides this service- As of the date of writing this proposal, no other provider provides the ability to take a paycheck in crypto.
OnJuno could provide the users the ability to directly convert their direct deposits into crypto-currency.

3 Step Test

Step 1: Compliance Check - OnJuno receives the paycheck from the employer in cash following the Fair Labor Standards Act. It automatically converts a part of the paycheck into crypto, acting as an intermediary between the employee and the broker-dealer. Further, no minimum wage obligation is caused by volatility, as the cash is auto-debited to buy crypto after the paycheck has been successfully received.

Step 2. Strategic/Ops - It is strategically, and operationally possible for OnJuno to automatically convert a user's direct deposit (paycheck) into cryptocurrency, thereby reducing the steps involved for a user to on-ramp to crypto.  Additionally, there is no cost or alteration of the payroll process required to be done by the employer. It creates a win-win-win scenario for all the parties involved (OnJuno-Employer-Employer)

Step 3. Product - High Priority. Post MIP 1.
